page.title: 03Types of housing in Kenley
page.content: The housing in Kenley is varied.In Hermitage Rd.the houses are big and have got quite alot of land.Some of them are like cottages which are pretty.They are all detached.Along Valley Rd.most of the houses are semi detached.Although the odd one or two are detached.Also there are a few bungalows along there.Godstone Rd. has quite a few rows of terraced houses.These are where the working people live.There are three blocks of flats along Valley Rd.These flats are mostly for people who have just got married and haven't got much money. The{Godstone Rd.}is the main road through our area.I live at 247 Godstone Rd. I like living at my house because it is always noisy and I am used to the noise. I do not like my house because it is too small,and it has only got a small garden.
